Who to support?

At the times of the global pandemic donation of any funds can be very helpful. Supporting any areas and fields affected or exhausted by the current situation is welcomed.

You can support medical staff in hospitals or help school facilities afford the purchase of electronic equipment for online teaching, or donate to many trustworthy projects and initiatives.

Think carefully though, and choose wisely to whom you ultimately fund. Even during a crisis like this, there is a number of people who might take advantage of your good intentions.
